content.text:
# List of Malian Grammy Award winners and nominees

The following is a list of Grammy Awards winners and nominees from Mali:
{| class="wikitable sortable"
! Year !! Category !! Nominees(s) !! Nominated for !! Result
|-
| 1992 || rowspan=5|Best World Music Album|| Salif Keita || Amen ||
|-
| 1995 || Ry Cooder and Ali Farka Touré || Talking Timbuktu ||
|-
| rowspan=2|2000 || Ali Farka Touré || Niafunké ||
|-
|rowspan=2|Salif Keita || Papa ||
|-
| 2003 || Moffou ||
|-
| rowspan=2|2006 || Best Contemporary World Music Album || Amadou & Mariam || Dimanche à Bamako ||
|-
| Best Traditional World Music Album || rowspan=2|Ali Farka Touré & Toumani Diabaté  || In the Heart of the Moon ||
|-
| rowspan=2|2007 || rowspan=4|Best Contemporary World Music Album || Savane ||
|-
| Salif Keita || ''M'Bemba ||
|-
| rowspan=2|2010 || Amadou & Mariam || Welcome to Mali ||
|-
| Oumou Sangaré || Seya ||
|-
| 2011 || Best Traditional World Music Album || Ali Farka Touré || Ali and Tounani ||
|-
| 2012 || rowspan="5"|Best World Music Album || Tinariwen  || Tassili ||
|-
| 2013 || Amadou & Mariam || Folila ||
|-
| 2015 || Toumani Diabaté and Sidiki Diabaté || Toumani & Sidiki ||
|-
| 2018 || Tinariwen || Elwan ||
|-
| rowspan=2|2019 || Fatoumata Diawara || Fenfo ||
|-
| Best Dance Recording || Disclosure featuring Fatoumata Diawara || Ultimatum'' ||
|}
